Nobody ever asks how to play my main {{item:3070}} {{champion:161}} {{item:3070}}
How do you play {{champion:161}} ?

I could totally go off on that, but I'll assume you were humoring me.

Now, assuming from your username that you're a Vlad main, I can offer some tips if you ever find yourself *against* a Vel'Koz:
- Use your minions as a shield when he Qs. A good Vel can and will hit you at least some of the time if given the chance.
- Do not get hit by an E+W. Ever. Use anything you need to. Just don't.
- If you get Deconstructed, blow W, and you can't kill him, you're fucked.

Or just build Spirit Visage, in which case he can still kill you with a full combo, but at least he can't do any real poke damage.
